vulnerability.name: USN-4142-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4142-1 fixed a vulnerability in e2fsprogs. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that e2fsprogs incorrectly handled certain ext4 partitions.  An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.

statements.status_notes: e2fsprogs could be made to execute arbitrary code if it is running in a crafted ext4 partition. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
